description: Rear roof extension; single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear additions); conversion of a garage into a habitable space including associated external alteration
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: OS Map, EX-00 Existing Site Plan, EX-01 Existing Ground Floor Plan, EX-02 Existing First Floor Plan, EX-03 Existing Second Floor Plan, EX-04 Existing Roof Plan, EX-05 Existing Front & Rear Elevations, EX-06 Existing Sections, PP-00 Proposed Site Plan, PP-01 Rev C Proposed Ground Floor Plan, PP-02 Proposed First Floor Plan, PP-03 Proposed Second Floor Plan, PP-04 Proposed Roof Plan, PP-05 Rev B Proposed Front & Rear Elevations, PP-06 Proposed Side Elevations & Sections.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
